title: Houses and Hail Stones- A Bad Combination
description: Houses and hail stones? Laura and Larry talk about the recent hail storm in Dallas and how to prepare yourself for what comes after as well as steps you can take to ready yourself next time.
itunes:subtitle: Houses and hail stones? Laura and Larry talk about the recent hail storm in Dallas and how to prepare yourself for what comes after as well as steps you can take to ready yourself next time.
